# Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** ACAN 23-580732Z Tube Bundles
**Reference Number:** cb-825-15280962

**Publish Date:** October 26, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2023 14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** November 13, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 29, 2025

## Overview
The National Research Council Canada is issuing an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the supply of two (2) newly fabricated tube bundles that can be installed inside the intercooler shells of an 8MW Dresser-Rand compressor. The tube bundles require aluminum extruded fins or integral aluminum finned tubes. The contractor will also provide on-site service and repair with a turnaround time of less than one (1) week.

## Contract Details
The contract is estimated to be $350,000 CAD (including HST) with each tube bundle costing approximately $100K CAD. The contract duration is from November 13, 2023 to March 29, 2025.

## Pre-identified Supplier
Thermofin is the pre-identified supplier, with experience in designing and manufacturing tube bundles for similar compressors. However, interested suppliers may submit a Statement of Capabilities to compete for the contract.

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to various trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, and others.

## Requirements
The contractor must be able to manufacture and supply two (2) newly fabricated tube bundles that meet the specified requirements. The contractor should also provide written evidence of their ability to provide on-site service and repair.

## Procurement Process
Suppliers interested in competing for the contract should submit a Statement of Capabilities by November 10, 2023, at 14:00:00.

## Contact Information
For inquiries and Statement of Capabilities submissions, please contact Katie Homuth, Senior Contracting Officer, at Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca.

## Attachments
The full tender notice is available for download at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23194/23-580732z_en_acanthermofin26oct23.pdf (English) and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23194/23-580732z
